summary: This bill, the Forced Arbitration Injustice Repeal Act, aims to prohibit predispute arbitration agreements and joint-action waivers in employment, consumer, antitrust, and civil rights disputes. It defines these dispute types and amends Title 9 of the United States Code accordingly. The bill's purposes include protecting individuals' rights to participate in class actions and ensuring access to judicial enforcement for protected rights. It aims to invalidate agreements forcing arbitration in the aforementioned areas, affecting contractual processes and legal recourse.
